Posts.Content: Hi there,I am in a virtually identical situation to yours.I am HER2 + and have had my first session of chemo FEC.I used a cold cap and noone has suggested that I shouldn't(the oncologist said I shouldn't bother because he said my hair would fall out anyway.)I think everyone is different with hair loss so what happened to your friend won't necessarily happen to you.The cold cap is really unpleasant though.
Posts.Title: HER2+ Chemo (epi cmf) Cold caps (advice please)
